name: Improved Feint Partner
text: Knowledge of your companions’ tricks and techniques allow you to take even greater advantage of your allies’ feints.
prerequisites: Bluff 1 rank, Combat Reflexes, Feint Partner, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: Whenever an ally who also has this feat successfully feints against an opponent, that opponent provokes an attack of opportunity from you.
staminaText: When you feint, you can spend 5 stamina points for each additional ally to grant an attack of opportunity to any number of additional allies—not just those with this feat.
text_zh: 对于盟友诡计和战技的知识让你可以透过他的虚招得到更多的好处。
prerequisites_zh: 唬骗1级，战斗反射，联合虚招。BAB+6。
benefit_zh: 当拥有此专长的盟友成功使用虚招时，中招的敌人引发你的一次借机攻击。
staminaText_zh: 当你进行虚招时，你可以赋予任意数量的额外盟友一次借机攻击——即使他们没有这个专长，对于每一个你给予攻击的额外盟友你都要消耗5点耐力。
